name: national-parks-app
description: Interactive National Parks Map Application - US and Canadian National Parks with advanced features

scripts.download-data: python3 scripts/download_national_parks.py && python3 scripts/download_canadian_parks.py && python3 scripts/download_indian_parks.py && python3 scripts/download_india_unesco.py && python3 scripts/download_jyotirlinga_temples.py && python3 scripts/download_shakti_peethas.py && python3 scripts/download_india_other_temples.py && python3 scripts/download_india_mutts.py && python3 scripts/download_divya_desams.py && python3 scripts/download_india_forts.py && python3 scripts/download_nepal_parks.py && python3 scripts/download_nepal_temples.py && python3 scripts/download_nepal_unesco.py && python3 scripts/download_nepal_trekking_flights.py && python3 scripts/download_sri_lanka_parks.py && python3 scripts/download_sri_lanka_temples.py && python3 scripts/download_costa_rica_parks.py && python3 scripts/download_airports.py
